thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very comfortable stay
thread.title_full: Very comfortable stay - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Iain N
title: Very comfortable stay
text:
Given that this is both an airport and convention center hotel, I wasn't expecting much.
However, the facilities are great (there is a gym), the food in the restaurant was good and the bar was cozy.
The staff also were good and were helpful and attentive. If you are going to the ExCel or to LCY, this is a great little spot.
